name: KODE
tagline: Best people do best work in app development&IoT
description:
We develop mobile application for business, airlines, banks, startups and life. Companies from TOP-100 of Russia are our clients.  Also we create useful IoT-services and voice apps.
We test our product decisions on focus groups; our art directors, which has a great amount of interface solutions, verify design; and architects with 10 years’ experience of industry commercial development project software. QA department has a huge set of test equipment and starts work with requirements testing, design verification for compliance with Apple and Google guidelines and finalizes with customer acceptance tests.
We choose project management framework depending on type of the projects, use both Scrum and Waterfall.
In addition to the excellent design and perfect code, we also carry out complex integration of our applications with customer systems such as banking software or Navitaire reservation systems. According to this we develop separated intermediate middleware servers.
